name: Robot and Lawnmower THE GAME
description:
It's a game made for Monthly Competition on Grant Abbit's discord channel.

It'a a Temple Run type game. You have to run away from the mower. It's very simple at the moment. I'll add some powerups, more sounds, better soundtrack etc.

Controls:
A, D - movement

space - jump

esc - pause

r - reset high score
